name: Fedora Man's Adventures
description:
Hello, this is my first game jam ever!

Fedora Man's Adventures is a turn based and puzzle game where the player, The Green Fedora Man uses the WASD keys to move and to get to the Golden Fedora without dying. The player has to avoid the spikes and the Grey Fedora Men. 

It is pretty short and I didn't have enough time to make a main menu or music, but I'm pretty happy with it.

I made everything from scratch. For the art I used the free version of Pixel Studio which you can find on steam and for the sfx I used bfxr: https://www.bfxr.net

The font I used is FFF Forward: https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html

Hope you'll enjoy the 9 levels this little game has to offer.
